## Installation

Choose your package manager:

**Using npm:**
```bash
npx shadcn@latest add https://gooey-toast.vercel.app/r/gooey-toaster.json
```

**Using pnpm:**
```bash
pnpm dlx shadcn@latest add https://gooey-toast.vercel.app/r/gooey-toaster.json
```

**Using yarn:**
```bash
px shadcn@latest add https://gooey-toast.vercel.app/r/gooey-toaster.json
```

**Using bun:**
```bash
bunx shadcn@latest add https://gooey-toast.vercel.app/r/gooey-toaster.json
```

This will:
- Install the `@gooey-ui/core` package automatically
- Create a wrapper component at `components/ui/gooey-toaster.tsx`
- Import the required styles

## Usage

Add the `<GooeyToaster />` component to your root layout:

```tsx
import { GooeyToaster } from "@/components/ui/gooey-toaster"

export default function RootLayout({ children }) {
  return (
    <html lang="en">
      <body>
        {children}
        <GooeyToaster />
      </body>
    </html>
  )
}
```

Then trigger toasts anywhere in your app:

```tsx
import { toast } from "@/components/ui/gooey-toaster"

// Basic usage
toast('Hello World!')

// With variants
toast.success('Operation successful!')
toast.error('Something went wrong')
toast.warning('Please be careful')
toast.info('Did you know?')
toast.loading('Processing...')

// With description
toast.success('Saved!', {
  description: 'Your changes have been saved successfully.'
})

// With action button
toast('File deleted', {
  action: {
    label: 'Undo',
    onClick: () => toast.success('Undone!')
  }
})

// Promise-based toasts
toast.promise(fetchData(), {
  loading: 'Loading...',
  success: 'Done!',
  error: 'Failed'
})
```

## Props

| Prop | Type | Default | Description |
|------|------|---------|-------------|
| position | `top-left` \| `top-center` \| `top-right` \| `bottom-left` \| `bottom-center` \| `bottom-right` | `bottom-right` | Toast position on screen |
| gap | `number` | `8` | Gap between toasts (px) |
| duration | `number` | `4000` | Default display duration (ms) |
| expand | `boolean` | `false` | Expand toasts on hover |
| visibleToasts | `number` | `3` | Maximum visible toasts |
| closeButton | `boolean` | `false` | Show close button |
| richColors | `boolean` | `false` | Use rich colors for variants |
| className | `string` | â€” | Custom CSS class |

## Toast Options

| Option | Type | Description |
|--------|------|-------------|
| variant | `default` \| `success` \| `error` \| `warning` \| `info` \| `loading` | Toast variant |
| description | `string \| ReactNode` | Additional description text |
| action | `{ label: string, onClick: () => void }` | Action button |
| duration | `number` | Custom duration for this toast |
| icon | `ReactNode` | Custom icon |
| important | `boolean` | Make toast stay until dismissed |
| dismissible | `boolean` | Allow manual dismissal |
| onDismiss | `() => void` | Callback when dismissed |
| onAutoClose | `() => void` | Callback when auto-closed |
| spring | `{ stiffness, damping, mass }` | Custom spring animation |
| bounce | `number` | Bounce intensity (0-1) |

See [full documentation](https://github.com/satyajitghana/gooey-toast) for all options and advanced usage.
